pages.text:
RoverPass
The Place to Be for Campground Reservations
RVers can search and book thousands of campgrounds thanks to a winning combination of software
and a stellar customer support team.
We also supply campgrounds and RV parks with great tools and services to help them succeed online,
including the amazing RoverPass Booking System to manage reservations.

Founder & President
Our Mission
The campground industry is a true all-American, small-business community. The family business atmosphere
has a charm hard to find in other, commercially driven, travel sectors.
An industry dominated by small businesses causes a unique technology problem, though. With less
properties owned by corporations, there's less widely dispersed booking technology.
That's why there isn't an Expedia for campgrounds and RV parks. RoverPass is here to solve this problem
with easy-to-use, awesome software for campgrounds along with travel agents to help RVers.

Contacting RoverPass Support
How to reach us!
Important Note:
If you are a camper, please be aware that campground owners receive, action, and manage RoverPass reservations directly.
If you are inquiring about a reservation change,
cancellation
, or specific property details,
please reach out to the property that you are inquiring about directly
.
RoverPass cannot modify reservations on their behalf.
You can find their contact information on your reservation confirmation or on their individual property website.
Visit our
Help Center
to find answers to common questions. We continuously update our help center with new articles each month. Please look here first before directly contacting support.
If you are a
camper
Visit our camper support page:
How to Contact RoverPass Customer Support
If you are a
campground owner, manager, or employee
Visit our campground support page:
How to Contact RoverPass Support
